page.title: 07CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: As well as activities based round the schools the{churches}all have active men's and women's groups and also for youngsters there are{boys' and {girls' brigades, scouts and guides. Many boys' clubs have{football}teams which compete in local leagues. There is great pride in local team Bonnyrigg Rose who won the Scottish Junior Cup in 1978. There are also a number{social clubs in the area where people enjoy a game of bingo and chat over a drink. These are mainly{ex-servicemen's clubs}or {miner's welfare clubs.}The area also has many{bars and hotels}in which to spend a pleasant evening.
